title: Data Type Validator
description: Write a program that takes in a list of variables and their corresponding data types, and validates if the assigned value matches the declared data type. The variables and their data types will be given as a dictionary where the keys are the variable names and the values are the data types. The assigned values will be given as a list in the order they appear in the dictionary.
sample_output: Validation results: var1 - int: True, var2 - str: True, var3 - float: True
